signs.movement_description: A two-part sign. First, touch the fingertips of the flattened 'AND' hand to the side of the mouth. Then, move the hand up and touch the same fingertips to the temple.
signs.contact_point: Fingertips touch mouth, then fingertips touch temple.
signs.source_description: Place the fingertips of the 'AND' hand first at the mouth then at the temple.

signs.start_location: Head level, fingertips touching to form a peak.
signs.end_location: Shoulder level, hands parallel and apart.
signs.movement_description: Start with both flat hands touching at the fingertips above the head to form the peak of a roof. Then, move the hands apart and straight down to outline the walls of the house.
signs.source_description: Place both flat hands together at head level then move them apart and straight down simultaneously.

signs.movement_description: A two-part sign, similar to 'HOME'. First, touch the fingertips of the 'D' hand to the side of the mouth. Then, move the hand up and touch the same fingertips to the temple.
signs.contact_point: Fingertips touch mouth, then fingertips touch temple.
signs.source_description: Place the fingertips of the 'D' hand first at the mouth then at the temple.

signs.movement_description: Place both hands, palms down, above the head and move them forward simultaneously to indicate a flat roof.
signs.source_description: Place both hands with palms facing down above the head and move them forward simultaneously.

signs.start_location: In front of the body, hands together.
signs.end_location: To the sides of the body.
signs.movement_description: Start with both flat hands together in front of you, palms down. Move both hands outward to the sides, indicating a flat, wide surface.
signs.contact_point: Sides of hands may touch at the start.
signs.source_description: Place both flat hands together with palms down in front of your body and move both outward.
